name: The Frosted (The Frosted Game | Purple Brain Studio)
name_original: The Frosted (The Frosted Game | Purple Brain Studio)
description: The Frosted is an arcade style action game with the character’s upgrade system; win enemies with bomb explosions, solve the puzzles, explore the levels and find the missing parts of the Artifact together with the main characters, Ursula and her brother Trin, who helps her during the long journey through the Northern Region Khortlacht
developers: The Frosted Game | Purple Brain Studio
